sentence.Network_en: The process of alternating solid rock masses is called metamorphism.
sentence.Network_cn: 固体岩体变换的过程即所谓变质作用.

sentence.Network_en: Danba area has undergone multiperiod deformation, metamorphism and magmatism since Mesozoic time.
sentence.Network_cn: 丹巴地区自中生代以来经历了多期的变形 、 变质和岩浆作用.

sentence.Network_en: The metallogenesis is close related with the Caledonian - Indosinian regional metamorphism.
sentence.Network_cn: 加里东期~印支期区域变质作用与成矿密切相关.

...变质相编辑变质相(metamorphic facies)是在一定的温度和压力范围内(不同成分的原岩经变质作用后形成的一套矿物共生组合引)它们在时间上和空间上重复出现和紧密伴生(每一个矿物共生组合与岩石化学成分之间有着固定的对应关系)<br.

means.word_mean: 1. change in the structure of rock by natural agencies such as pressure or heat of introduction of new chemical substances
